robe_plain.Name: Plain Work Robe
robe_plain.Description: Generic apprentice work robes. Starter equipment.

robe_silk.Name: Silk Robe
robe_silk.Description: Fine silk robes that resonate with magical energy.

cloak_winter.Name: Winter Cloak
cloak_winter.Description: Heavy wool cloak designed for the frozen highlands.

robe_velvet.Name: Velvet Robe
robe_velvet.Description: Luxurious velvet robes. Best non-unique equipment.

belt_plain.Name: Plain Belt
belt_plain.Description: A simple leather belt for holding pouches.

belt_studded.Name: Studded Belt
belt_studded.Description: Reinforced leather belt with metal studs.

belt_dragon.Name: Dragon Hide Belt
belt_dragon.Description: Tough belt crafted from authentic dragon hide.

boots_leather.Name: Leather Boots
boots_leather.Description: Basic sturdy boots for exploring the academy.

boots_dragon.Name: Dragon Skin Boots
boots_dragon.Description: Lightweight and indestructible dragon skin footwear.

gloves_leather.Name: Leather Gloves
gloves_leather.Description: Simple gloves for handling magical ingredients.

gloves_dragon.Name: Dragon Skin Gloves
gloves_dragon.Description: Ancient dragon skin provides superior power.

cloak_heavy.Name: Heavy Cloak
cloak_heavy.Description: A thick heavy cloak that dampens physical blows.

cloak_starched.Name: Starched Cloak
cloak_starched.Description: Chemically treated cloak that resists magical ailments.

acc_wooden_beads.Name: Wooden Beads
acc_wooden_beads.Description: A simple necklace of enchanted wooden beads.

acc_spectacles.Name: Spectacles
acc_spectacles.Description: Enchanted glasses that improve focus and hit rate.

card_1.Name: Abe no Seimei
card_1.Description: Legendary Japanese onmyoji master of spirits.

card_2.Name: Baba Yaga
card_2.Description: Slavic witch who flies in a mortar.

card_3.Name: Circe
card_3.Description: Greek goddess famous for beast transformation.

card_4.Name: Merlin
card_4.Description: The quintessential advisor to kings and master of prophecy.

card_5.Name: Morgan le Fay
card_5.Description: Powerful enchantress of Avalon and master healer.

card_7.Name: Marie Laveau
card_7.Description: The Voodoo Queen of New Orleans.

card_8.Name: Hecate
card_8.Description: Titaness of magic crossroads and the moon.

card_9.Name: Faust
card_9.Description: Scholar who bartered his soul for infinite knowledge.

card_10.Name: Medea
card_10.Description: Expert in herbs poisons and dark enchantments.

card_11.Name: Paracelsus
card_11.Description: Pioneer of elemental studies and alchemy.

card_12.Name: Thoth
card_12.Description: Ancient Egyptian god of wisdom and divine magic.

card_13.Name: Cassandra
card_13.Description: Prophetess cursed to never be believed.

card_14.Name: Solomon
card_14.Description: Biblical king with power over many spirits.

card_16.Name: Völva
card_16.Description: Norse seeress and practitioner of Seidr magic.

pot_antidote.Name: Antidote
pot_antidote.Description: A standard medicinal brew that neutralizes most common toxins.

food_rock_cake.Name: Rock Cake
food_rock_cake.Description: A very hard traditional fruit cake. Mind your teeth!

mat_wolfsbane.Name: Wolfsbane
mat_wolfsbane.Description: Highly toxic plant also known as Aconite. Used in specialized potions.

mat_monkshood.Name: Monkshood
mat_monkshood.Description: A variety of Aconite with hood-shaped flowers.

mat_wormwood.Name: Wormwood
mat_wormwood.Description: A bitter herb essential for brewing Draught of Living Death.

mat_asphodel.Name: Asphodel
mat_asphodel.Description: A lily-like flower associated with the afterlife and mourning.

mat_mandrake.Name: Mandrake Root
mat_mandrake.Description: A root that resembles a human. Its cry is fatal when mature.

mat_bezoar.Name: Bezoar
mat_bezoar.Description: A stone taken from the stomach of a goat. Saves you from most poisons.

mat_aconite.Name: Aconite
mat_aconite.Description: A general term for highly toxic plants like Wolfsbane.

mat_beetle_eyes.Name: Beetle Eyes
mat_beetle_eyes.Description: Small crunchy eyes used as a catalyst in low-level brews.

card_dragon.Name: Dragon
card_dragon.Description: Legendary fire-breathing reptile of immense power.

card_vampire.Name: Vampire
card_vampire.Description: Immortal creature of the night that drinks blood.

card_imp.Name: Imp
card_imp.Description: Small mischievous devil of germanic folklore.

card_pixie.Name: Pixie
card_pixie.Description: Tiny flying trickster of british folklore.

card_gnome.Name: Gnome
card_gnome.Description: Earth-dwelling garden spirit defined by Paracelsus.

card_unicorn.Name: Unicorn
card_unicorn.Description: Pure white horse with a single horn.

card_griffin.Name: Griffin
card_griffin.Description: Majestic creature half lion half eagle.
